solution_line_template: To make a profit of ${desired_profit}, she needs to make ${desired_profit} + ${ingredient_cost} = $<<{desired_profit}+{ingredient_cost}={total_revenue_needed}>>{total_revenue_needed}
She needs to sell ${total_revenue_needed} / ${price_per_cup} = <<{total_revenue_needed}/{price_per_cup}={cups_to_sell}>>{cups_to_sell} cups of lemonade
